thread.title: The 20 best photos from Lada Gaga's stunning Super Bowl halftime show
thread.title_full: The 20 best photos from Lada Gaga's stunning Super Bowl halftime show

author: Brian
title: The 20 best photos from Lada Gaga's stunning Super Bowl halftime show
text:
Feb 5, 2017 at 9:07p ET 0Shares 
The Falcons took control of Super Bowl LI by jumping out to a 21-3 halftime lead, but it was Lady Gaga's high-flying performance that may have stolen the show. 
Here are 20 of the best photos from the epic haltime show, which began with a rendition of God Bless America from the roof of the stadium before the pop star sang portions of eight of her greatest hits. 
Bob Donnan Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports 
Bob Donnan Bob Donnan-USA TODAY Sports
